item.title: hugo官方相关文档地址
item.description: 快速开始 https://www.gohugo.net/getting-started/quick-start/ 安装hugo https://www.gohugo.net/getting-started/installing/ hugo主题获取地址 https://themes.gohugo.io/ hugo 安装主题 https://www.gohugo.net/themes/installing-and-using-themes/ hugo 主题配置和markdown渲染 默认是Goldmark https://gohugo.io/getting-started/configuration-markup#readout
